archimate:DataObject.name: Attribute
archimate:DataObject.documentation: An Identity trait, property, or quality of an Entity. A small set of Attributes of a Sovrin Entity, including its Public Key(s) and Service Endpoint(s), may be recorded on the Sovrin Ledger (specifically the Sovrin Domain Ledger). A private Attribute of a Sovrin Entity may be asserted by a Claim in a Credential.
